entry.title: Game: Minecraft (PC, 2009)
entry.content:
Game: Minecraft (PC, 2009)20151007
Last week some time, I decided to play Minecraft Survival with my
son because he loves it so much and I thought it would be nice to
do something he likes. The best part was that it gave him the
confidence to play on Survival himself and now he's having a lot
more fun playing than he used to on Creative.

We had a funny experience on our first night: we hid in the ocean
running around away from mobs. After building a basic house on a
hill on the coast, we began digging a mine. At first, I made it
like a big staircase going gradually down in one direction, but
then I realized it would be more efficient to make a spiral
staircase. Once we did that, we built another house inside the
mine. I spent a long time in that mine looking for
diamond. Eventually we found a cave structure and a lot of lava,
then finally after many days of effort found 4 diamonds. This was
enough to get a pickaxe and get some obsidian. It was tough
getting the obsidian because it kept burning up in the lava. We
got some water and dug out the obsidian to make sure no lava was
around before mining it. After we had it, we went back to the
surface to get ready for going to the Nether.

On the surface again, I made an automated wheat farm and made a
giant wall around my original house, mine entrance, and farm. I
transformed the area to make it so I had good sight-lines
everywhere and torches everywhere to prevent mobs from coming
in. I find that the wheat factory does not work very well and I
need a lot more seeds.

Total time: 9:00 (estimate)
  • Video Games
  • Minecraft
  • PC
  • 2009

entry.title: Justified - Season 1 - Episode 9 - Hatless
entry.content:
Justified - Season 1 - Episode 9 - Hatless20150505
I liked the resolution and journey of this episode. Although I'm
surprised they didn't take this opportunity to kill the husband
so Raylan could get back with Winona.

entry.title: Game: Lumines: Electronic Symphony (Vita, 2012) (3)
entry.content:
Game: Lumines: Electronic Symphony (Vita, 2012) (3)20150504
I played for about thirty minutes on a single round. It was too
long. You definitely get into the zone playing this game, but it's
not hard enough and feels really kind of boring and exhausting
after a while.

Total time: 1:52

entry.title: Justified - Season 1 - Episode 8 - Blowback
entry.content:
Justified - Season 1 - Episode 8 - Blowback20150504
This was a neat episode. I like the sub-plot and I'm very curious
what is going to happen with Winona and her husband. I feel like
they are building up to them breaking up and her and Raylan being
together.
  • TV Shows
  • Justified

entry.title: Justified - Season 1 - Episode 7 - Blind Spot
entry.content:
Justified - Season 1 - Episode 7 - Blind Spot20150503
I really liked the premise of this episode and I thought the
conversations that Rayland and Ava had with other people about
each other were very telling. I wonder if they are going to get
rid of each other?
  • TV Shows
  • Justified

entry.title: Justified - Season 1 - Episode 6 - The Collection
entry.content:
Justified - Season 1 - Episode 6 - The Collection20150501
This episode had an awesome punch-line. The intrigue with his
wife is cool. I like how they are slowly building the arc and
it's in his life, not in the criminal business.
  • TV Shows
  • Justified

entry.title: Movie: Pompeii, starring Kit Harington (2014)
entry.content:
Movie: Pompeii, starring Kit Harington (2014)20150501
This was a fun movie. I liked the way the event was depicted and
the plot, while terrible, was enough to move along and want to pay
attention. The girl was super hot.
  • Movies

entry.title: Justified - Season 1 - Episode 5 - The Lord of War and Thunder
entry.content:
Justified - Season 1 - Episode 5 - The Lord of War and Thunder20150430
It is interesting to see what is happening with Raylan's personal
life. I like that some plots will grow out of this episode.

entry.title: Justified - Season 1 - Episode 4 - Long in the Tooth
entry.content:
Justified - Season 1 - Episode 4 - Long in the Tooth20150429
I thought the girl was really funny and the opening was nuts. I
think it is good that they are not restricted to Kentucky, but I
feel like most things should be there for the local flavor.

  • Justified

entry.title: Justified - Season 1 - Episode 3 - Fixer
entry.content:
Justified - Season 1 - Episode 3 - Fixer20150428
This was a much more exciting episode. The resolution of the
hostage situation was really crazy, I'm so surprised he was fine
with what the girl did. I like how big these stories are even
though they are finished in one episode. Eva is cute, too!
  • TV Shows
  • Justified

entry.title: Justified - Season 1 - Episode 1 - Fire in the Hole
entry.content:
Justified - Season 1 - Episode 1 - Fire in the Hole20150427
This was an awesome first episode. I really got into the
characters and I'm excited about what is going to happen. I'm
surprised that Boyd died in the first episode... although I guess
maybe he isn't really dead. I wonder what will happen next!
  • TV Shows
  • Justified

entry.title: Justified - Season 1 - Episode 2 - Riverbrook
entry.content:
Justified - Season 1 - Episode 2 - Riverbrook20150427
This wasn't as cool, but it was still pretty neat. I still like
the characters, but I feel like the crime was much lower stakes
and so it was less interesting.

entry.title: Movie: Unbroken, starring Jack O'Connell (2014)
entry.content:
Movie: Unbroken, starring Jack O'Connell (2014)20150424
This was an interesting movie. I like how it went so many different
places and communicated this guy's struggle more. I wish there more
on his life afterwards and a bit more epicness, but it was pretty
cool.
  • Movies
  • 2014

entry.title: Movie: The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies, starring Martin Freeman (2014)
entry.content:
Movie: The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies, starring Martin Freeman (2014)20150423
This was a nice finish to the Hobbit movies. I thought that it was
a bit goofy when they showed the dwarf king being obsessed with
gold. I believe he would be, but I think it was shot and acted in a
goofy way. The final battle was pretty epic. Although, the thing I
like most about the Middle Earth movies is when the Hobbits and
other weak creatures do great and brave things... this movie didn't
really have any of that because everything important was done by
super-heroes.
  • Movies
  • 2014

entry.title: Rome - Season 1 - Episode 1 - The Stolen Eagle
entry.content:
Rome - Season 1 - Episode 1 - The Stolen Eagle20150420
This was a neat episode, but I wasn't crazy about the series. It
seems too similar in style to Game of Thrones, but not as
interesting and not as quality acting. I don't think I will
continue watching it.

entry.title: Movie: Dracula 2000, starring Gerald Butler (2000)
entry.content:
Movie: Dracula 2000, starring Gerald Butler (2000)20150418
I like Johnny Lee Miller and the whole cast actually. I like the
opening and how we are told that Van Helsing is a real guy with a
misunderstood past. Cute.

She would NOT go down the stairs! She'd know something was
up... except she's on the other side!

Nathan Fillion!

This is a fun version of Dracula!
  • Movies
  • 2000

entry.title: Movie: Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark, starring Harrison Ford (1981)
entry.content:
Movie: Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark, starring Harrison Ford (1981)20150417
This is such a classic movie. It was much goofier than I remember
it being, but it was still really fun. The girl is such a dope, it
is pretty insulting.
  • Movies
